doc.field: Time Inc. Time-Life News Service Records
Time Inc. Time-Life News Service Records

The Staff Files contain personnel and biographical files assembled on employees of the Time-Life News Service. These materials within these files were gathered by a variety of staff with the Time-Life News Service such as the business department, chiefs of correspondents, and deputy chiefs of correspondents. The records within this series cover the period of 1936 through 1987. Included in this series are payroll forms, dispatches, photographs, negatives, visa applications, clippings, job applications, timecards, article drafts, post cards, expense reports, allowance forms, benefit claims forms, receipts, invoices, itinerary, biographical data forms, writing samples, check requisition forms, CVs, resumes, college transcripts, list of job candidates, budget reports, reference letters, query sheets, personnel forms, cost of living reports, department of defense accreditation forms, press releases, vacation schedule forms, disability forms, work and rate records, purchase order forms, inventory forms, insurance forms, entry forms, birth certificates, and correspondence.
Time Inc. Time-Life News Service Records
